410-1 Security personnel trained in human rights 
policies or procedures
column3:
“Security-related impacts” is a sustainability issue for 
S3 covered by ESRS 1. Therefore, this GRI disclosure is

covered by MDR-P, MDR-A, MDR-T, and/or as an 
entity-specific metric to be disclosed according to
ESRS 1 and in accordance with MDR-M.

416-1 Assessment of the health and safety impacts of 
product and service categories
column3:
“Personal safety of consumers and end-users” is a 
sustainability issue for S4 covered by ESRS 1.

Therefore, this GRI disclosure is covered by MDR-P, 
MDR-A, MDR-T, and/or as an entity-specific metric to

be disclosed according to ESRS 1 and in accordance 
with MDR-M.

1. Therefore, this GRI disclosure is covered by MDR-P, 
MDR-A, MDR-T, and/or as an entity-specific metric to

be disclosed according to ESRS 1 and in accordance 
with MDR-M.
